sources.title: Defiance (2003) Justice by the barrel of the gun | Western Movie | by Doveed Linder
sources.description:
When a boy's father is slain by the town's most powerful man because he's not willing to pay his dues, he devotes his life to avenging his father's death.

Original title: Defiance (2003) 
Alternative titles: Blutrache, Em Busca de Vingança, Πληρωμένοι φονιάδες


This film is available with English and German audio, and subtitles in many languages.

Director & Writer: Doveed Linder
Stars: Brandon Bollig, Robert Nolan Clark, Walker Deibel
Genre: Western, Action, Thriller


00:00 - Full Western Movie (with subtitles)
00:24 - A man takes on a ruthless outlaw and his gang to bring justice to a lawless town.
06:45 - Lawmen face a deadly jailbreak in the heart of the Wild West.
13:55 - Hidden identities and revenge threaten to tear the town apart as Nathan Cross’s secrets unravel.
19:54 - Tommy's reckless actions spark a dangerous showdown in the Western frontier.
24:11 - Brothers clash over guns and work, fueling tensions in the Wild West.
30:22 - Seeking justice, brothers face danger and betrayal in a violent, untamed land.
41:21 - Navigating betrayal, brothers must make tough choices to survive in the Wild West.
49:35 - A man searches for his wife while facing deadly threats in a hostile western town.
57:46 - Will Cross seeks revenge against Clay Randall, leading to a deadly final standoff.


@CultCinemaClassics 

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

metadata.Plot: When a boy's father is brutally murdered by the town's most powerful citizen because he's not willing to knuckle under, the boy devotes his life to avenging his father's death. Years later, he becomes swept up in a vicious cycle of revenge and must sacrifice everything he has to protect himself and his family.
metadata.Actors: Brandon Bollig, Robert Nolan Clark, Walker Deibel
